Posts.Content: aspen04 wrote: Hello everyone,   I have read all your posts and find them informational. My heart goes out to all of you. I am reaching out to see if anyone has any information on the symptoms I am having. I am very nervous but dont want to worry my family or husband. I am pretty young 30 and I have found a hard bumpy lump on the inner left breast. It is not painful and does not move around. I have read that most lumps are nothing to worry about esp in my age group. However, I have always had a few complications with my menstral cycle or lack of one. It has never been unusual for me to go 6 months between cycles. I was told by a dr several years ago that my body had low progeterone and that after I had a child things make work themselves out. They didnt and I had a child 5 years ago. It has now been, that I can for certain say, 18 months since my last cycle. (I kept telling myself I needed to get into the Dr, but time has escaped me). I have read and been told that high lvls of estrogen can increase your risks for cancer. Now I am very nervous and all I think about is this CRAZY lump that is prob nothing and mad at myself for not getting into a dr sooner. So if any of you have experienced any of these symptoms please share.  AHHhhh hurry up dr apt. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Seeking information re symptoms. aspen04 Nichola
